data.name: Garnering Executive Buy-In by Chegg Sr PM
data.summary:
Main Takeaways:
- Inputs, Outputs, and Unknowns: learn the framework for the business case
- Data to Insights: find the right data points for your case, and tailor your communications to the most critical points for your audience
- Make the Commitment: Promise what you'll give in exchange for what you'll get
data.speakers:
Katherine Corson

Katherine is a Senior Product Manager at Chegg. Sheâ€™s worked within the Writing Tools business unit on their citations experiences, helping students automatically generate citations for their research papers.
